urls.title: EU261 compensation
urls.description: If yo ur SWISS flight arrives more than three hours late or is cancelled, you can check your right to claim compensation by using this online form in accordance with Art. 7 EC No. 261/2004. Please be aware that this form is to be used exclusively to check your right to compensation. For all other queries please use the complaints and compliments
